summary: An ordinance providing for the relief of certain property owners in the local improvement district assessed for the improvement of 5th Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from Denny Way to Mercer Street, by paving the same with asphalt, as provided for in Ordinance No. 13463, creating Local Improvement District No. 1230, and authorizing the City Treasurer to accept the amount of the original assessment levied on certain properties within said district without penalty or interest up to and including the first day of January, 1907.
